name: tm94
effect: Teaches rock smash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
